website_summaries.verdict: An affordable bass from Fender’s sister brand, Squier. Quality is excellent.
pros: This jazz bass has an iconic look and the legendary sound to go with it
It wears a maple neck, 20-fret rosewood fretboard, and two single-coil pickups for a wide tonal range
cons: Some users have reported tuners loosening up over time

customer_reviews.title: Feels and plays like a professional bass
customer_reviews.text: I've been a guitarist for 15 years and needed a cheap bass to do some recording. I picked this one up and was surprised by just how nice it was. This looks, feels, and plays like a bass quadruple the price. The headstock logo doesn't have the Fender prestige but the sound and playability is excellent and you wouldn't be able to tell the difference in a blind test. The neck is satin instead of lacquered which makes it much easier to move up and down the neck and it doesn't get sticky. This bass is a total steal. It was set up great out of the box. I couldn't recommend this more.
customer_reviews.author: Bill P.Top Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the buying!
customer_reviews.text: It's really an excellent bass! Good looking and is best than the picture on Amazon! Nice playing, tunes, strings. I'm a intermediate-professional musician specialized in Jazz-funk latin music in guitar playing, love this jazz bass!
customer_reviews.author: DLey07

customer_reviews.title: Great bass  great value
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, feels good. Amazon has a lot of different colored pickguards for like 10 bucks if you want to customize the look. Not just a "beginners" bass.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Like new was not like new.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a line new bass. It was in box like new after unwrapping I found the bottom of the guitar was missing chunks of the polyurethane color coating down to the wood. I ended up going to Sam Ash in Tampa to buy one I could hold and see it was brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound affordable installments and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Fender quality sound and completely affordable with the payment installments. I was charged for the first payment plus the tax when they shipped it out, then 4 additional payments without running my credit or get a new credit card. It shipped to me in one day with no damage so I was relieved and got it set up immediately. Thanks to Amazon and Fender for this amazing deal. I can’t wait to jam out with my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Lee

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive buy
customer_reviews.text: 52 years ago I was in a 9 piece band and played bass Had Fender precision bass and Fender Bassman amp. I do wish I'd kept them both but time moved on. This Squire does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Damage
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, except there was damage to it when arrived. Update- I finally got into contact with the seller and they fixed this issue quickly.
customer_reviews.author: barbbta

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without the low E string tuner!
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely unbelievable to me how bad the packaging was for this guitar. There was nothing but a cheap piece of plastic covering the guitar, and placed in a box without any protective padding such as styrofoam or bubble wrap. What a joke! Typical 3rd world manufacturing. PIECE OF GARGABE...I returned and bought myself a REAL BASS at Guitar Center.
customer_reviews.author: bryan betts

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods!!!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed!!!! Here I got this great gift for my boyfriend on Xmas.... Never opened the box because it was packed perfectly for wrapping. And it's damaged.... I can't believe that someone did not see this rather large chip in QC.... so obviously I was just the unlucky one to get a damaged product. And it would be such a pain to return. Just bad business!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Squier Does It Again! Jazz Bass a Winner!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Fender guy for fifty plus years, I'm a guitar player, but recently I thought it would be fun to have a bass to play around with. After a little research the Squier Jazz Bass seemed to fit the bill. Wow! I can't believe that Squier can produce such a fine instrument for such a reasonable price. This is way more than a beginners bass. Many of my bass player friends use these basses at gigs when they don't want to risk loss or damage of their big dollar rigs. Well done Squier, well done Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: David Linn

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, plays great, IS great
customer_reviews.text: I needed an inexpensive bass for my home studio. This bass does NOT sound inexpensive, which is the main thing I was concerned about. It plays smooth, and while it’s a lower version of Fender basses, you would never know when it comes to the sound coming through while recording. If you haVe a home studio and need a bass, GET THIS ONE. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Kelly (Sam T Wasteaway)

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Player Loves Squier Jazz Bass POV
customer_reviews.text: After touching my guitar only once since 2016 I realized that I definitely am my father's daughter- we are meant to play bass. I needed a bass for school since covid wouldnt allow me to practice on the faculty's bass and I was decided to go with this beautiful jazz bass in silver. My dad loves it, I love the more earthy sound of a jazz bass compared to the stingier p-bass. Came with just a teeny bit of the protective plastic on the pickguard messed up but its ok, its not visible from more than a foot or two away. Love how this bass sounds and feels, I'm so excited to learn more and be like my dad 😊❤
customer_reviews.author: NekoCapsule

customer_reviews.title: Noice 🅱️ass
customer_reviews.text: It's a good bass for beginners, but if you know what your sound you'll notice that the tone is pretty bad. Also there was a giant sticker on the bass that was hard to remove, so it left scratch marks on the body when I was trying to get it off. The bass is really good for bending, harmonics, and the frets are a nice length. Definitely a nice, long, neck
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great bass
customer_reviews.text: My only issue was a big chunk of paint and clear coat off of the back from shipping. I sent a message to fenders page about my return options. I never heard anything back from them. Other than that it is an amazing bass for the price. Plays great, sounds great. I'm just bummed it was damaged when I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bass. But damaged when received.
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent bass just like the other reviews say but mine arrived with a decent sized chip/crack in the paint. It was disappointing to receive it damaged as it was too much of a hassle to return it for a new one. I kept it and so far it plays and sounds quite decent.
customer_reviews.author: P.Kold

customer_reviews.title: Incredible purchase for beginners and intermediate players!
customer_reviews.text: I am simply amazed with how nice this bass feels and sounds. Having bought all my instruments in a shop, I was a bit skeptical to purchase an instrument online, I have zero regrets and am looking at a few more basses now. Thank you for this incredible find and was lucky to get this with special financing! Really amazing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steven V.

customer_reviews.title: So many awful details
customer_reviews.text: The neck needed to be adjusted because the strings were rubing it, the volume/tone knobs came broken, the second string snap just after 3 days of been playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Bass
customer_reviews.text: Very good bass! The action needed to be adjusted a little but great find!
customer_reviews.author: Thebigz

customer_reviews.title: My bass died.
customer_reviews.text: Bought "like new". Discounted price. Neck was broken in half just under the first fret. Used the body for a project but it's pretty scuffed up too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this guitar for our son and it is perfect for him. He's been playing for a little over a year and needed an electric bass for the band he is in. It works well, sounds great, and looks very sharp on stage. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: It does not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time like i did it. Terrible product!
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Good for it's price
customer_reviews.text: After a little set up it plays well, did have to replace one rattling tuner head though
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Really nice wood
customer_reviews.text: Just set string height, tune up and jam. I bought fender pieces for it but thats my preference. It’s sweet
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Squier Bass Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bass arrived in safe packaging and in beautiful condition!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Rutt

customer_reviews.title: For the price couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: Solid purchase..if your on the fence about this bass, just get it you won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bass and Great Price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it and it plays so nice for it being a beginner series.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Bass
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful instrument. Just learning how to play. Plays and sounds nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Fender
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners, or experienced players. Great sound and looks great and tunes easily.
customer_reviews.author: Natascha S. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: perfect bass
customer_reviews.text: even my advanced friends were shocked to find out is was from the squier line. totally worth the money. only small issue was the frets weren't really filed down all the way on the edges so it scratched my skin a bit. but that is negligible for the price and quality of this
customer_reviews.author: conrad fietsam

product_meta.title: Squier by Fender Affinity Series Jazz Bass - Laurel Fingerboard - Brown Sunburst
product_meta.description: Color:Brown SunburstA superb gateway into the time-honored Fender family, the Squier Affinity Series Jazz Bass delivers legendary design and quintessential tone for today’s aspiring bassist. This J Bass features several player-friendly refinements such as a slim and comfortable “C”-shaped neck profile, a 4-saddle bridge for solid string stability, and vintage-style open-gear tuning machines for smooth, accurate tuning. Loaded with two Squier single-coil J Bass pickups for a wide variety of tones, this model is ready to help lay the foundation for any player at any stage.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars152 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
